rules.name: Agent_Not_Selected
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR(3 AND 4 AND 6) OR (2 AND 4 AND 5)
rules.label: Agent Selected, Pass

decisions.name: Is_Opp_Owner_User_Setup_In_Order
decisions.label: Is Opp Owner User Setup In Order?

Flow.description: This flow is no longer in use. Requirement change - A new General Opportunity for the Bond is no longer created when the Pre-Approval is lost.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar}, "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_CreateGeneral
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!generalOppVarId}, "Click here to Navigate to the General Opportunity" , '_top')

Flow.label: Manual Opportunity Creation - Bond Subflow

recordLookups.label: Get Bond Opp Record Type Id

recordLookups.label: Get General Opp Record Type Id

fields.name: newGeneral
fields.fieldText:
Select the campaign of the new General Opportunity for customer: {!Get_Person_for_Opp.FirstName} {!Get_Person_for_Opp.LastName}


The new General Opportunity will be created and converted to a Bond.

fields.name: createGeneralBond
fields.fieldText: Select the source of the new General Opportunity for customer: {!Get_Person_for_Opp.FirstName} {!Get_Person_for_Opp.LastName}

fields.name: selectAgentError
fields.fieldText: Please search for a name before continuing

value.stringValue: Select the agent that provided the opportunity
AND( Profile.Name = 'Consultant' OR Profile.name = 'Team Lead') AND IsActive = TRUE ORDER BY Name

fields.name: timezoneError
fields.fieldText:
Please review the Region user setup for this opportunity's owner and try again: {!Get_Selected_Owner_User.FirstName} 


The user Region is required to populate a Reference Number.

fields.name: campaignSLAerrorMsg
fields.fieldText:
The campaign that you have selected for this opportunity does not have a SLA populated:

  • Campaign: {!Get_Campaign_Selected.Name}

Please ensure that the missing campaign setup data is captured and try gain.

fields.name: adminBlockHelp
fields.fieldText:
The Profile that you are assigned to only allows for creating opportunities on behalf of someone.


Please click on Next and select the above mentioned option.

fields.name: userSetupError
fields.fieldText: Please review the Time Zone, Locale and Language user setup for this opportunity's owner and try again: {!Get_Selected_Owner_User.FirstName}
